title: My account Banned ?
body:
Hey i connect after longtimes break and i see my account permanent ban ? Why Oo

he was ban the 19 february ? i think i contact the support for my account recovery

replies.body:
It's likely your account was compromised during the time you were away and used for something like scripting that got it banned. Go through the account recovery process with support, and assuming compromise was the cause you may be able to get your account back.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
